20110106112812.000|20110106112814.000|CC1|TOLD BY THE DEAN OF THE

20110106112817.000|20110106112819.000|CC1|COMMITTEE HEARING RULE WAS      
20110106112819.000|20110106112820.000|CC1|SMALL BY DESIGN.                
20110106112820.000|20110106112821.000|CC1|WHY?                            
20110106112821.000|20110106112825.000|CC1|TO KEEP US OUT, MR. BRODER SAID 
20110106112825.000|20110106112826.000|CC1|TO ME.                          
20110106112826.000|20110106112827.000|CC1|MR. SPEAKER, DURING THIS QUEST  
20110106112827.000|20110106112828.000|CC1|FOR TRANSPARENCY, WE ARE GOING  
20110106112828.000|20110106112830.000|CC1|TO HAVE ONLINE STREAMING OF OUR 
20110106112830.000|20110106112831.000|CC1|RULES COMMITTEE MEETING THAT    
20110106112831.000|20110106112833.000|CC1|WILL TAKE PLACE AFTER WE ARE    
20110106112833.000|20110106112837.000|CC1|SEATED HERE.                    
20110106112837.000|20110106112838.000|CC1|MR. SPEAKER, I ASK UNANIMOUS CON
20110106112838.000|20110106112841.000|CC1|SENT THAT ALL MEMBERS HAVE FIVE

20110106112845.000|20110106112848.000|CC1|DEAL OF ZEAL, ENTHUSIASM AND    
20110106112848.000|20110106112901.000|CC1|GRATITUDE

20110106114116.000|20110106114118.000|CC1|HOUSE, JOHN BOEHNER, AND THE NEW
20110106114118.000|20110106114120.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN MAJORITY -- AND

20110106114123.000|20110106114124.000|CC1|ADDRESS THESE AMERICAN          
20110106114124.000|20110106114128.000|CC1|CHALLENGES, YOU WILL FIND UA    
20110106114128.000|20110106114129.000|CC1|WILLING PARTNER.

20110106115006.000|20110106115007.000|CC1|PUBLIC THAT IT SERVES.          
20110106115007.000|20110106115010.000|CC1|LET'S START WITH THE RELEASE    
20110106115010.000|20110106115011.000|CC1|PACKAGE THAT THE HOUSE WILL     
20110106115011.000|20110106115012.000|CC1|CONSIDER TODAY.                 
20110106115012.000|20110106115016.000|CC1|IF PASSED, IT WILL CHANGE HOW   
20110106115016.000|20110106115017.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION OPERATES.      
20110106115017.000|20110106115019.000|CC1|WITH AN EMPHASIS ON REAL

20110106115022.000|20110106115025.000|CC1|FOCUS ON OUR CONSTITUTION.      
20110106115025.000|20110106115027.000|CC1|OUR AIM WILL BE TO GIVE THE     
20110106115027.000|20110106115028.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT BACK TO THE AMERICAN 
20110106115028.000|20110106115029.000|CC1|PEOPLE.

20110106115043.000|20110106115045.000|CC1|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM THAT BIGGER 
20110106115045.000|20110106115047.000|CC1|BILLS ARE ALWAYS BETTER.        
20110106115047.000|20110106115049.000|CC1|THAT FAST LEGISLATING IS GOOD   
20110106115049.000|20110106115050.000|CC1|LEGISLATING.                    
20110106115050.000|20110106115052.000|CC1|ALLOWING AMENDMENTS AND OPEN    
20110106115052.000|20110106115054.000|CC1|DEBATE MAKES THE LEGISLATIVE    
20110106115054.000|20110106115057.000|CC1|PROCESS LESS EFFICIENT THAN OUR 
20110106115057.000|20110106115100.000|CC1|FOREFATHERS HAD INTENDED.       
20110106115100.000|20110106115101.000|CC1|THESE MISCONCEPTIONS HAVE BEEN  
20110106115101.000|20110106115102.000|CC1|THE BASIS FOR THE RITUALS OF A  
20110106115102.000|20110106115104.000|CC1|MODERN WASHINGTON.              
20110106115104.000|20110106115106.000|CC1|THEY, IN MY OPINION, HAVE NOT   
20110106115106.000|20110106115108.000|CC1|BEEN SERVED WELL TO THE AMERICAN
20110106115108.000|20110106115111.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110106115111.000|20110106115112.000|CC1|TODAY, MINDFUL OF THE LESSONS OF
20110106115112.000|20110106115116.000|CC1|THE PAST, WE OPEN A NEW CHAPTER.
20110106115116.000|20110106115117.000|CC1|LEGISLATORS AND THE PUBLIC WILL 
20110106115117.000|20110106115118.000|CC1|HAVE THREE DAYS TO READ THE BILL
20110106115118.000|20110106115120.000|CC1|BEFORE IT COMES TO A VOTE.      
20110106115120.000|20110106115121.000|CC1|LEGISLATION WILL BE MORE        
20110106115121.000|20110106115124.000|CC1|FOCUSED, PROPERLY SCRUTINIZED,  
20110106115124.000|20110106115126.000|CC1|AND CONSTITUTIONALLY SOUND.     
20110106115126.000|20110106115128.000|CC1|COMMITTEES, ONCE BLOATED, WILL  
20110106115128.000|20110106115131.000|CC1|BE SMALLER, WITH IRANIAN        
20110106115131.000|20110106115134.000|CC1|MISSION, INCLUDING OVERSIGHT.   
20110106115134.000|20110106115136.000|CC1|OLD " -- WITH A RENEWED MISSION,
20110106115136.000|20110106115137.000|CC1|INCLUDING OVER SAID.            
20110106115137.000|20110106115139.000|CC1|OLD RULES WILL BE REPLACED BY   
20110106115139.000|20110106115140.000|CC1|NEW REFORMS THAT MAKE IT EASIER 
20110106115140.000|20110106115141.000|CC1|TO CUT SPENDING.                
20110106115141.000|20110106115143.000|CC1|WE WILL START BY CUTTING        
20110106115143.000|20110106115146.000|CC1|CONGRESS' OWN BUDGET.           
20110106115146.000|20110106115203.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110106115203.000|20110106115206.000|CC1|BUT ABOVE ALL ELSE, WE WILL     
20110106115206.000|20110106115210.000|CC1|WELCOME THE BATTLE OF IDEAS,    
20110106115210.000|20110106115213.000|CC1|ENCOURAGE IT, ENGAGE IT OPENLY, 
20110106115213.000|20110106115216.000|CC1|HONESTLY, AND RESPECTFULLY.     
20110106115216.000|20110106115217.000|CC1|AS THE CHAMBER CLOSEST TO THE   
20110106115217.000|20110106115219.000|CC1|PEOPLE, THE HOUSE WORKS BEST    
20110106115219.000|20110106115221.000|CC1|WHEN IT IS ALLOWED TO WORK ITS  
20110106115221.000|20110106115223.000|CC1|WILL, AND I ASK MEMBERS OF THIS 
20110106115223.000|20110106115226.000|CC1|BODY TO JOIN ME IN RECOGNIZING  
20110106115226.000|20110106115227.000|CC1|THIS, IN TRUTH.                 
20110106115227.000|20110106115230.000|CC1|TO MY COLLEAGUES IN THE
